metadata.name: Curse Rewards
metadata.description:
Every time you complete a floor with a curse, you get a reward. The reward is based on the curse you completed.
Curse rewards operate on a rarity table from common to ultra rare.
Examples of curse rewards:
Curse of Darkness: The Sun, Night Light, Blanket Curse of the Labrynth: Jera, Crooked Penny, Diplopia Curse of the Lost: Ansuz, Compass, Cain's Eye Curse of the Unknown: Red heart, Bloody Penny, Yum heart Curse of the Maze: The Moon?, Teleport 2.0, Cracked orb Curse of the Blind: Soul of Isaac, Options, Mystery Gift
If you want to add a curse reward, please make a pull request on the github page. https://github.com/tichaelmurvey/boi_curse_rewards.git
